timeline.bodyText: Let's specify the admin URL  https://localhost:9443/admin
timeline.author: shaniR
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,27 +4,37 @@ Custom throttling allows system administrators to define dynamic rules for speci
 
 `resourceKey, userId, apiContext, apiVersion, appTenant, apiTenant, appId, clientIp`
 
-For example, the following sample custom policy allows the admin user to send 5 requests per minute to the Pizza Shack API. Login to the admin portal at (https://<ip\_address>:<port>/admin) and navigate to **THROTTLING POLICIES** tab and click **CUSTOM POLICES** tab to define a custom policy
+For example, the following sample custom policy allows the admin user to send 5 requests per minute to the Pizza Shack API. 
 
-**Key Template**
+1.  Sign in to the Admin Portal using the URL (https://<ip\_address>:<port>/admin) and your admin credentials (admin/admin by default).
